org.compiere.wf

Class MMailText

  • java.lang.Object
    • BasePOName
      • org.compiere.wf.X_R_MailText
        • org.compiere.wf.MMailText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_R_MailText, I_Persistent

    public class MMailText
extends X_R_MailText
    Request Mail Template Model. Cannot be cached as it holds PO/BPartner/User to parse
    Version:
    $Id: MMailText.java,v 1.3 2006/07/30 00:51:03 jjanke Exp $
    Author:
    Jorg Janke
